definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)

sentences.english: She loved to hear me, often switching off the radio to beg me to sing it one more time.
sentences.chinese: 她喜歡聽我唱歌，常常關掉收錄機，央求我再唱一遍。

sentences.english: A; I've got a long-lens Pentax and a cassette recorder.
sentences.chinese: 我帶了一個長鏡頭賓得相機和一個收錄機。

sentences.english: My stereo isn't working very well, I can't pick up any radio stations.
sentences.chinese: 我的收錄機不好用，因爲它接收不到任何一個電臺。

sentences.english: The recorder you borrowed last week is to be returned before May 6.
sentences.chinese: 你上週借的收錄機應當於五月六日前歸還。

sentences.english: The factory has come out with several new models of radio-recorders this year.
sentences.chinese: 工廠今年生產了幾種新型收錄機。

sentences.english: The cassette recorder is a present for my daughter.
sentences.chinese: 收錄機是爲我女兒買的禮物。
他的立體聲收錄機接地了。
